comet.agent.nlu.dummy_nlu module¶

SlotFillingNLU is a basic implementation of nlu designed to work for Slot-Filling applications. The purpose of this class is to provide a quick way of running Conversational Agents, sanity checks, and to aid debugging.

class comet.agent.nlu.dummy_nlu.DummyNLU(**kwargs)[source]¶
